summary: In Riverwood, a Lockbox is washed down the river. It contains a Mother's last gift for their child.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ea9999]Note: If you want an enchantment free version: [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57897][u][color=#a4c2f4]You can grab it here.[/color][/u]
[/url]
Short Version[/b]
In Riverwood, a Lockbox is washed down the river. It contains a Mother's last gift for their child.

[b]Slightly Longer Version
[/b]This mod adds a lockbox across the river from the woodpile/mill. Inside is a letter and "A Mother's Pendant" enchanted with Muffling. As for what happened to the mother and child? Who knows.

[b]Quick "How To Find" Guide
[/b][list=1][*][b]Fast Travel To Riverwood[/b][/*]
[*][b]Enter the Town until you get to the first fork in the road[/b][/*]
[*][b]Turn Left, follow till you get to the river.[/b][/*]
[*][b]Look on the other side of the river, near the edge until you find the lockbox.
[/b][/*]
[/list]
author: Darkdatatrc
